Resilient Futures

Resilient Futures: Prepping for Disaster in Community
2023, Lexington KY

Getting ready for disaster is way more about making friends than holing up in a bunker. With the increases in climate disaster and our current political climate, thinking through how to support each other through the hard times is the best way to prepare.
Resilient Futures explores thoughts on grounding into community, how to prepare, some prompts to think through, and what items you may need.
